name: Gomoku (itch)
description:
WARNING: Do not play with hard difficulty on the web version, please download windows version for that. The reason is an equivalent of stack overflow for Webgl.

Gomoku is a strategy game where you have to put 5 pieces in a row. The IA uses a minMax algo with alpha/beta pruning.

The opponent can capture two of your pieces in this configuration : "bwwb" if you play with white pieces.

The game is under development, features to be expected :

  • Better UI
  • Faster IA thinking
  • More difficulty
  • Some music ?
